body:
## Expected Behavior
Startup temporalio/auto-setup:1.10.3 by docker-compose

## Actual Behavior
2021/06/23 10:02:53 error executing statement:Error 1067: Invalid default value for 'session_start'

2021/06/23 10:02:53 Loading config; env=docker,zone=,configDir=config

2021/06/23 10:02:53 Loading config files=[config/docker.yaml]

{"level":"info","ts":"2021-06-23T10:02:53.611Z","msg":"Unable to create file based dynamic config client, use no-op config client instead.","error":"error checking dynamic config file at path config/dynamicconfig/development.yaml, error: stat config/dynamicconfig/development.yaml: no such file or directory","logging-call-at":"main.go:136"}

{"level":"info","ts":"2021-06-23T10:02:53.611Z","msg":"Starting server for services","value":["history","matching","frontend","worker"],"logging-call-at":"server.go:117"}

{"level":"info","ts":"2021-06-23T10:02:53.621Z","msg":"Get dynamic config","name":"system.advancedVisibilityWritingMode","value":"off","default-value":"off","logging-call-at":"config.go:79"}

Unable to start server. Error: sql schema version compatibility check failed: version mismatch for keyspace/database: "temporal". Expected version: 1.5 cannot be greater than Actual version: 0.0

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

  temporal:
    image: temporalio/auto-setup:1.10.3
    container_name: temporal
    environment:
      - DB=mysql
      - DB_PORT=3306
      - MYSQL_USER=root
      - MYSQL_PWD=${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD}
      - MYSQL_SEEDS=172.30.0.36
      - DYNAMIC_CONFIG_FILE_PATH=config/dynamicconfig/development.yaml
    ports:
      - 7233:7233
    volumes:
      - ./temporal/dynamicconfig:/etc/temporal/config/dynamicconfig
    depends_on:
      - mysql


## Specifications

  - Version:
  - Platform:
title: mysql 5.7: sql schema version compatibility check failed
